short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-stop solution for Venture Capital and the Investment Ecosystem

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Web Clipper for Taghash simplifies the process of adding deals to your CRM. With just a few clicks, you can instantly capture vital information from any webpage. It automagically extracts key information about the company from its webpage, eliminating the need for manual data entry.
